verbs.description: attorney general candidate and his democrat justin nelson and [ARG0: his mobile billboard] [V: featuring] [ARG1: the mugshot of attorney general ken paxton] were kicked out of a hotel drop - off area monday moments before he was to begin a press conference slamming the incumbent for alleged legal transgressions nelson campaign parked the truck with a billboard of the attorney general dubbed the mugshot mobile at the doubletree motel across the street from a state building where staff from the attorney general office work the nelson campaign said valet staff gave him permission to park the truck there earlier in the day although upper - level management asked his team to move the vehicle attorney northeastern illinois university nashville nashville post general manager tennessee andrea zelinski nashville tennessee associated press securities fraud chicago - area fraud attorney general ken paxton austin illinois justin nelson springfield paxton jim reist texas university of illinois
